channel.title: Has anyone had any luck with U-Verse Portforwarding?
channel.description:
I need to know if anyone has been able to port-forward on AT&T U-Verse; I have tried multiple times to do this, but every time my port is still closed.
If you have been successful, please make a guide or tell me how you did so.
Thanks.
EDIT: I GOT IT OPEN! YAY! As it turns out, my comodo firewall was on with my windows firewall. Oddly enough, when i turn both firewalls off it blocks doesn't allow connections, but when windows firewall is on and comodo is off, it works.

item.title: Has anyone had any luck with U-Verse Portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Craddock Mod Craddock
item.description:
@Mod_Craddock wrote:

I already did, they aren’t any help. When i check the port to see if its open, it says “Connection Refused”.

Read full topic
